thread.title: Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 53,966 Mets slugger Cespedes hit in left hand by pitch, leaves game (Yahoo Sports) PHILADELPHIA (AP) -- New York Mets slugger Yoenis Cespedes has been hit in the left hand by a pitch and exited the game in Philadelphia.
